#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

bool ispalin(int num)
{
    int rev = 0;
    int temp = num;
    while(temp) {
        rev = rev * 10 + (temp % 10);
        temp /= 10;
    }
    return (num == rev);
}

int revnum(int num)
{
    int rev = 0;
    while(num) {
        rev = rev * 10 + (num % 10);
        num /= 10;
    }
    return rev;
}

int main() 
{
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--) {
	    int n, cnt = 0;
	    cin >> n;
	    while(!ispalin(n)) {
	        int rev = revnum(n);
	        n = n + rev;
	        cnt++;
	    }
	    cout << cnt << " " << n << endl << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
